name: Aku
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
text1: yaad tha mujhe tera birthday hai OKAaY
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Party kaha hai like every time...
text3: me toh call karne wala tha subha 8 baje, but mujhe lga tu so rha hoga
text4: me toh shamm me call karta but fir tera msge dekh kar socha kuch
outroText: Okay, toh ab free toh hoga nhi tu call ke liye
replayText: bhula nahi tha mai date, yaad thi mujhe unlike someone
